ctx: intros d hd tl a la ls.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "taille_0 (prec_cons ?a ?p ?p0)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros d hd tl a la ls.
exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), ad -> forall la ls : prec_list, S match ls with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 ls + S (DTA_taille d + Nat.max (term_high hd) (term_high_0 tl) * S (DTA_taille d)) | prec_empty => 1 end <= S (taille_0 la + taille_0 ls + S (DTA_taille d + Nat.max (term_high hd) (term_high_0 tl) * S (DTA_taille d))) d : preDTA hd : term tl : term_list a : ad la, ls : prec_list H : forall la ls : prec_list, 1 <= S (taille_0 la + taille_0 ls) Unable to unify "S (taille_0 la + taille_0 ls + S (DTA_taille d + Nat.max (term_high hd) (term_high_0 tl) * S (DTA_taille d)))" with "S (essence hd d)".

original: intros d hd tl a la ls. simpl. rewrite <- conservation_3. rewrite <- conservation_5_0. reflexivity.
